messages.subject: Panama Mom
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hi Tracy, I remember her! I was on the Christ Centered Unschoolers list when all that was going on. Heartbreaking, and I am so glad to hear she got both
messages.messageBody:
> On another list, an adpotive mother in Panama found that the
> legalitites of
> the adoptions meant that the daughters couldn't get visas when the
> family
> were due to return to the US.

Hi Tracy,

I remember her! I was on the Christ Centered Unschoolers list when all
that was going on. Heartbreaking, and I am so glad to hear she got both
girls back here. Last I heard she only had one of them cleared. I wrote
the Arizona senators and congressmen using a form letter she had at her
website. Her daughters were just the most darling girls you ever saw too!
Huge dark eyes... melted my heart! They also enlisted the help of local
radio and tv stations.

Carol Wickwire <*)))><
Angeli 17, Amber 16, Amanda 14 and Adam 11
Homeschooling For the Glory of God at Oceanside Academy
http://www.onelist.com/subscribe/Florida-homeschool
"Do not love the world or the things in the world. If anyone loves the
world, love for the Father is not in him." 1 John 15
